Key Match Events: Shivam Dube scored an unbeaten half-century to lead India's successful chase of 159
Rohit Sharma was run out for a duck in the first over of India's chase
Post-Match Reflections: India brushed Afghanistan aside in the first game in chilly Mohali
Miscellaneous Highlights: Arshdeep Singh started with a maiden at his home ground
Rahmanullah Gurbaz and Ibrahim got into their groove with ramped fours later in the powerplay
Others: Afghanistan captain Ibrahim Zadran was dismissed by Shivam Dube
Jitesh Sharma also impressed with 31 off 20 balls
Axar Patel had a popgun firing darts on the stumps or just a shade outside off
Kuldeep Yadav, India's first-choice spinner, was rested
